Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Pastor Luis Aviles, CASA DE LA FE CHURCH located at 1810 Randal Ave , Bronx. NY 10473.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Farías.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Lester Aviles, Casa De La Fe Church, 1810 Randall Avenue, The Bronx, N.Y. 10473.



Council Member Farias moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Adams), the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) adjourned these proceedings to meet again for the Stated Meeting of Thursday, October 19, 2023.

MICHAEL M. McSWEENEY, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader (Council Member Powers) presiding as the President Pro Tempore.

The presence of a quorum was announced by the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers).

There were XX Council Members marked present at this Stated Meeting.

The Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports, which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:
